verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> thee in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>; The name <S%H8034><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> set thee up on high <S%H7682><s%>;
Send <S%H7971><s%> thee help <S%H5828><s%> from the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, And strengthen <S%H5582><s%> thee out of Zion <S%H6726><s%>;
Remember <S%H2142><s%> all thy offerings <S%H4503><s%>, And accept <S%H1878><s%> thy burnt-sacrifice <S%H5930><s%>; <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Grant <S%H5414><s%> thee thy heart <S%H3824><s%>'s desire <S%H4390><s%>, And fulfil all thy counsel <S%H6098><s%>.

We will triumph <S%H7442><s%> in thy salvation <S%H3444><s%>, And in the name <S%H8034><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%> we will set up our banners <S%H1713><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> fulfil <S%H4390><s%> all thy petitions <S%H4862><s%>.

Now know <S%H3045><s%> I that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> saveth <S%H3467><s%> his anointed <S%H4899><s%>; He will answer <S%H6030><s%> him from his holy <S%H6944><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> With the saving <S%H3468><s%> strength <S%H1369><s%> of his right hand <S%H3225><s%>.
Some trust in chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and some in horses <S%H5483><s%>; But we will make mention <S%H2142><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>.
They are bowed down <S%H3766><s%> and fallen <S%H5307><s%>; But we are risen <S%H6965><s%>, and stand upright <S%H5749><s%>.
Save <S%H3467><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Let the King <S%H4428><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> us when <S%H3117><s%> we call <S%H7121><s%>.
